title: [INFO] Merging to main branch is temporarily closed.
body:
Please target all non-features PRs to the newly created vs17.9 branch, from where they would be automatically brought to the main. 
Please target main branch if it is a feature PR and when PRs are ready, mark them with "merge-when-branch-open", and our team will merge them as soon as possible.

nodes.body: Merging to main is open now.
